response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000. I believe this is an excellent chance for you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable price. Kindly let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
